website_summaries.verdict: The best set of bongos for hobbyists and aspiring professionals, offering the highest construction quality and sound.
pros: Use of Siam oak (Hevea brasiliensis, or Pará rubber tree) creates a brighter percussive sound that will cut through large instrument ensembles
Drumheads are made of natural buffalo skin
cons: Drum shells can warp when coming in contact with excessive moisture

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Sounds nothing like the drum in the video in my eyes I linked my own video so you can hear for yourself It might sound better with a stand idk. Metal digs into your legs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They sound good for the money...so good for it honey
customer_reviews.text: I am a very beginner drummer. I bought these to learn on. When I set up a lesson with a drum teacher, he was skeptical at first, expecting plastic kiddy drums I guess. After he used them he said, good quality and a great deal. Keep in mind I am not qualified to comment on the quality compared to more expensive drums. But for the price, they are great for beginners anyhow
customer_reviews.author: Grady

customer_reviews.title: Finally, some responsive, resonant, percussive bongos on a budget
customer_reviews.text: A very impressive instrument. I've tried a few different sets of $40 - 100 bongos (GP B2 Pro-Series and CP Traditional Wood Bongos) and have been sorely disappointed. Flat sound, crap action, shoddy construction. Then these Tycoons showed up. What a difference: vibrant and percussive tone; responsive action; sturdy and detailed construction. Splurge the extra $20 and get a pair you'll actually enjoy playing. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent instrument for filling the solitary days
customer_reviews.text: I used to play drums on the tables or any surfaces that made drum sound. This is a great improvement in beating the solitary time with some beats. Very convenient to put on my lap while on a chair or bed. Small enough to put on a kitchen counter. It is not that loud so I would not annoy the neighbor.
customer_reviews.author: Dipankar Das

customer_reviews.title: At least he's no longer emptying cans and containers around the house to try and find a good sound! Score one for MOM
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for Christmas for my 18 year old who suddenly got the desire to bang on anything and everything. I figured lets get him something he's supposed to bang on.....hence the bongos. That was a mistake! LOL He plays them so much, I had to threaten him with eviction! At least he's no longer emptying cans and containers around the house to try and find a good sound! Score one for MOM!
customer_reviews.author: Daegan's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these just for the hell of it. I've never owned bongos before, so all I can say is that they seem pretty durable and they sound good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound great! Well worth the extra $20 over the most popular bongos.
customer_reviews.text: These are great? Came pre tuned, sound just great. I 1st bought the Amazon most popular for about $33 but returned them because of a large scratch. I'm so glad I did and got these instead. They sound so much better,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 10 year old's birthday along with a DVD on how to play. He loves them and my two younger kids are starting to play with them as well. They seem really high quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaMomof4

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and quality for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: These are quality instruments, not toys. The sound is better than I expected for the price, and they are quite sturdy. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie-B

customer_reviews.title: Wow - what sound and quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this for son for X-mas thinking it was a gag. He loved the Big Band Theory and the episode where Sheldon plays the bongos. I was genuinely surprised at the quality and sound of these. Eventhough my son bangs away at them...they arent annoying at all. If you want a good quality pair of bongos, get these. They are made of sustainable wood products and therefore, ecofriendly, Highly recommend the sound and quality.
customer_reviews.author: David Argent

customer_reviews.title: Great set of Bongos
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a Christmas gift for my partner. As soon as they arrived I took them to a local music store to get a bag and stand, the salesman said this is a great set of bongos (I was taken aback at first, I mean how often do you hear that line). My partner loves them and I happily put in my headphones and watch High Castle.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: I am a toddler when I play these...
customer_reviews.text: As stated in the description- I am not a talented musician, I am a singer who likes to have a beat to my random ballads and ridiculous burst of idiocy songs. They are made good enough that I don't destroy them, and they have a nice sound. They came with a tuning wrench... to which I thought, "Bongos need tuning?" My real musicians friends will never find out, because surely they will crack on me. So basically, if you aren't a musician or if you have a kid that you want off the pots & pans- great product. Plus the deep wood color looks rich and pretty =)
customer_reviews.author: kriddlelynn

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a set of bongos to use in my studio for folks that just want to bang along with the music - these were a good price and I figured, what the heck, if they got destroyed or something, I wouldn't be out much. Turns out they are very nice, have a wonderful sound and I have used them in recordings where they sound really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Rick C. Simonsen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Bought this as a Christmas gift and the receiver was excited about what good quality these were. Price for these is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Kassonmo

customer_reviews.title: I do not play bongos
customer_reviews.text: So, I will not bore you with details like sound or handy ness of said bongos. What I know is that they are solidly constructed, have tough heads which seem like they will last a long time, and that my eight-year-old nephew loves them. I do not recall where they were made, but saving the last star for stuff made from sweatshop free, handmade drums of the future.
customer_reviews.author: Questionably nuts.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Did a little research before buying this set. Very happy with the purchase. They are easy to use and sound good. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: ShenValley

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: We loved them until one of the dogs discovered it was made out of rawhide. That is of no fault to the maker! Just our own carelessness
customer_reviews.author: Rick Doerflein

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far.
customer_reviews.text: Just started to use, trying to understand how to tune and viewing YouTube vids to learn. I would suggest including tuning recommendations.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good. I'm not a professional, ordered it for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: SOFIYA

customer_reviews.title: Bongo cat doesn’t play nice ones like these.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality craftsmanship and materials sound great and they are a hit everywhere I take them and anyone who plays them. Let the good times roll.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a musician but was looking for "real" bongos as per my son's birthday wish. His face lit up with delight when he saw these. They are sturdy even for a 5 yr old boy, do not wobble on a hard surface, have a sound that my son loves and aren't obnoxious when he plays and plays and plays on them. It served my purpose perfectly. I'm not sure about how a true musician feels about the sound. I don't have the ear for that.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Montes

customer_reviews.title: This is actually an instrument!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap bongos tend to be horrible...tried the Pyles and had to return them. But these are real bongos! Thick hide heads that ring well and get loud. Nice wood construction. Keepers.
customer_reviews.author: peederj

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box I could tell these were a solidly made set of bongos. Sound great and feel great. Highly recommended for a beginner or even someone with experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to these and couldn't be happier! 7 inch needed tuned after 2 weeks but that was it. Perfect set.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product & great value!
customer_reviews.text: My son on the spectrum LOVES this set! He is learning how to play & boy got Rhythm.
customer_reviews.author: IYZ

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap bongos ... Babalooo
customer_reviews.text: These are a great set for the price. Great sound and quality. I love them and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Ivanova9

customer_reviews.title: Love my bongos!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bongos on a whim when they were on sale for Black Friday. I have always been interested in bongos and enjoy playing instruments. I am not a great bongo player, but I love playing them. Even though I can't play anything in particular, there is a soothing sound and feel to these bongos. I am ver happy with them, especially for a first time bongo user.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Impressive bongos
customer_reviews.text: These bongos are so awesome! The wrench for tuning is very helpful, great sound and beautiful craftmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Pjl

customer_reviews.title: They're good for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are some fine bongos, my first ever pair. I'm new to the percussion world. Maybe they need more time breaking in, but the heads don't really resonate deep warm sounds like I've heard from Toca bongos around the same price range.
customer_reviews.author: Who's Asking

customer_reviews.title: Set was warped where joined, would not sit flat, tips, rocks. Skins on drum head top were defectively thin. Poor Quality Unit.
customer_reviews.text: The set I got was warped where joined, would not sit flat, tips, rocks. The skins on drum head top were defectively thin with light shining through. This means the stretch will never be even enough to keep them in tune. The tension adjusters were almost as tight as they could be, not leaving any margins for the leather tops to stretch much farther. Flat dull tone. Made in Thailand. Inspected at the factory. Ha Ha. From Amazon Warehouse Deals - buyer beware when getting fragile or delicate items from that vendors that resells returned goods. This was a bad unit. A good unit would have received a good review.
customer_reviews.author: Q.C. Stickler

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound And Quality And Price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bongo to arrive in two days and I was pleasantly surprised. This bongo not only met all my hopes and expectations of a great sound and quality, but also the look is great and it came with a tuner, which I did not realize at the time of ordering it. I love these bongos! I would recommend you buy a pair if you love bongos too. Oh and they look exactly like the picture. The price was cheap for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Davilla

customer_reviews.title: great sound, great price, great for kids
customer_reviews.text: this is a decent musical instrument that you won't mind hearing your little kids play. Haven't tried tuning them yet, but glad I can. The rawhide skin is durable--8 months of toddler boy use hasn't damaged it yet. The solid wood has a great tone and superior durability. Glad to have them in the mix for the kids. My little 18 month's eyes really light up when he plays them.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 18 year old son, who has played percussion for 7 years. He loves them. They are of excellent quality for the price. They're not tuned very well when they arrive, but they come with the wrench needed to tune them and my son was quickly able to get them tuned. I would definitely recommend these to anyone, beginner to experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Bang away.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a musician and I've never played one on tv, but when I saw these go on sale I had to grab a set. Very good quality in my opinion, very solid construction. A lot of fun to play along with the stereo when the urge strikes me. My nephews and niece love them as well. If I didn't get along with my brother as well as I do I'd buy them each a set.
customer_reviews.author: MEZ

customer_reviews.title: They sound good!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice bongos! When you first get them, the heads are new. They will untune with time so for a while youll need to keep retuning them. Also the head texture is very nice and the wood smells like quality bongos
customer_reviews.author: John Martins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to waste time
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. Now if my wife felt the same way it would really exciting. I have discovered that A) Tito Puente was brilliant and B) I have no rhythm. Now for the product. For the price, you will not find a better set of bongos. I looked at a local music store and I would have paid $20 more for a lessor set.
customer_reviews.author: Bob of Ozarks

customer_reviews.title: They look fantastic
customer_reviews.text: And sound great too. Best bongos for the money for sure!
customer_reviews.author: RtAyLoR8131

customer_reviews.title: Great Bongos for any age or level
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I got these bongos. I mostly just wanted to have fun with them, but the more I played, the better they sounded. I gradually got better with my hand positioning and striking, and even been trying to play latin-style music like salsa and merengue for fun. They feel, look and sound really great, are well built, and are just plain cool!
customer_reviews.author: Alan A. Barriga

customer_reviews.title: Nice bongos. I learned the hard way not to ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bongos. I learned the hard way not to say that to a woman, even though she was playing the bongos and they were nice. I am very happy with these and get lots of enjoyment from playing them.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Rose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and very comfortable to manage
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and very comfortable to manage. Highly recommend for anyone, professional or beginner. These bongos are very nicely made and have great sound. I did quite a bit of research and feel that I made a good choice. Would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This item shipped really fast and sounds fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love my bongos. My kids play them and we really are happy with them after having them 1 year. I'm sorry I forgot to leave a review right after I bought it. That was rude of me. They are beautiful, perfect size, great sound. I couldn't be disappointed with anything about my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: depthofyourskin

customer_reviews.title: Best set of bongos to start on. Good price and awesome sound!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of bongos. My first onewas a waste of money (read my review). These bongos are great! Way heavier than my first set. Well made, great finish and easy to tune with the wrench included. I like the sound and the fact that they are environmentally-friendly as they are manufactured with Siam Oak Wood. I have looked high and low for a good and affordable set of bongos. I have read hundreds of reviews on the internet and I can tell you that by far these are the best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: drfrancov

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Looks nice. Fun to bring out at parties.
customer_reviews.author: SSZLC

customer_reviews.title: It was great use during the drum circle I hosted and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this item twice. One for personally use and once for my school's club (school paid for it obviously). It works as intended and I have yet to have any problems with it. It was great use during the drum circle I hosted and it's definitely something I plan to use in future events.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Omeluk

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my kid. He has a recent fondness for musical instruments and asked if we could look into bongos. Everyone in our family has fun on these things. They make a really authentic sound.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize these bongos would be of such great quality. I bought them for my eight-year-old son. I almost didn't give the bongos to him because these seemed like a professional grade! I got them during a lightening deal and, goodness, it was truly a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: L. Gadd

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bongos
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an expert on them, but these seem like good quality bongos that will last us a good long while, provided the kids don't hit them with something other than their hands (they have been told that rule). Sound good, very solid and surprisingly heavy for the size (which I would consider a good thing).
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Rowell

customer_reviews.title: Affordable And Fantastic Sounding
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these bongos simply aiming for something cheap and entry level to play around with. It turns out that they actually have a fantastic sound, and in addition they look great and tune really easily. There's really not much more to say; they work well and they aren't expensive at all. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Very strong material and authentic
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great and feels very authentic. Son 5 yrs old was standing on it and it did not break at all so it’s child proof. Not a knife of course but steping on it will last.
customer_reviews.author: chrisnyuki

customer_reviews.title: Bongos looks great
customer_reviews.text: The first one was broken. I replaced that. The second one looks great. I think it's a good choice for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Denys Korolkov

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to play with my daughter and bought it based on the reviews as I know nothing about bongos other than I didn't want the baby ones, but real ones to grow with. She beats on them and I do too. They seem very well built as I have had them for several months. Easy to tune and the natural finish is very nice. They are pretty heavy too. Totally worth it for the price. I can see years of use from them.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Drums.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a percussion enthusiast for Christmas and we were all amazed at the quality. they needed to be tuned slightly, but they are beautiful and make surprisingly good sound for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: S. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy playing these a lot, really easy entry percussion instrument as well as a fun jamming instrument. If you've never played an instrument and can hold a beat, try out percussion for some mindless fun. I can beat for hours!!!!
customer_reviews.author: YO

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bongos
customer_reviews.text: These are fun for the kids to play on but the sound does not project as well as I hoped they would. They are good, middle of the road bongos to play on.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, feel well made. My son likes to play with them.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my toddlers. I'm impressed by build quality. They seem really sturdy. Tuning them was pretty simple.
customer_reviews.author: Inner Child

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I read all of the reviews and sure enough, they sound great! If you want to get inspired, check out youtube: Djembes and bongos @ drum circle and djembe jam in Bangkok part 2
customer_reviews.author: Kimbas Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as Christmas gift for my dad, seems professional and really good price.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Bongos, better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I received it earlier than expected, the Bongo came intact in an excellent condition, took it out and start playing right away, of course needed some tightening with the supplied wrench, I'm not an expert but a friend of mine examined it and gave it a high 5. depending in what you are going to play with it, I bought it to play mainly Bachata rhythms , my expert friend told me he is going to buy the same one, it plays according to him better sound than his $300 bongo, when it comes to playing Bachata rhythms. Over all very satisfied with what I got and great money value.
customer_reviews.author: Elmuiz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sad these are a gift. Would love a set myself. High quality. Great tone. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Bones27

customer_reviews.title: such a good sound
customer_reviews.text: totally love this ones, havent had bongos before, and I actually play de guitar, but bought this for my friends in our parties. They sound so good, and everybody love them
customer_reviews.author: NMC 3001

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Bought for drum lessons and teacher approved of their quality.
customer_reviews.author: HJK

customer_reviews.title: Great set of bongos
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother-in-law who is 83. My wife and I play ukulele and I play guitar, mom keeps the beat :) Fun set, reasonably priced and sound good too. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Keith S-B

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of drums. They look great, sound great and are reasonably priced. Very satisfied with this purchase and would recommend without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Kochergal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Delivered as promised. Had a blast jamming with my friends using it.
customer_reviews.author: Epee Fencer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up Bongo People!
customer_reviews.text: At 3 a.m. I bought this from my phone while I was in my bed. It was an impulse buy by an insomniac drummer and it was well worth it. Absolutely gorgeous color and amazing sound. They came in only a few days, well packaged and ready to play! The price is great and the quality is better. I highly suggest this to everyone because everyone needs bongos and these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: I<3STUFF

customer_reviews.title: Great bongos, great price
customer_reviews.text: These are not professional level bongos, but I am not a professional musician either. They are just what we wanted in that price range.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Malham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These bongos are great for beginners like me! The tune is clear and the workmanship is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bongo drums for my teenage daughters. I was pleased with the quality & workmanship on them. They have a good sound and are well made. They are great for the price. My daughters love them!
customer_reviews.author: K. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Tycoon Percussion Bongos
customer_reviews.text: I like them! I am a free-lance player. They are easy to adjust and the sound is very good. Well-made, good quality. Now, if I could only play with a Combo...Just kidding.
customer_reviews.author: Hispanam

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Great sound and looks great. Got it for poly-rhythm practice. :) It doesn't take up too much room, either - fits nicely on my bookshelf.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound. These are some quality bongos. Everyone loves them and I absolutely love the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Emjay

customer_reviews.title: This was a very good buy. The sound is great and they are ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good buy. The sound is great and they are built to last!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Mac

customer_reviews.title: My baby boy loves these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my infant/toddler boy to bang on. We've had a lot of fun banging away on these and they've stood up to a 1-2 year old for at least a year. Sturdy construction, maybe not the best sound but they are inexpensive but not cheaply made. Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: For grandson
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for grandson after reading reviews and am very happy I did. It has a good sound and even his dad enjoys playing it. After checking out cheaper models at local toy stores I was glad I found this on Amazon. Not just a kid's toy and worth the extra $.
customer_reviews.author: M. Komaba

customer_reviews.title: awsome!!
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my child for his 11th birthday - he loves them, but is driving mom nuts. very good quality nice tone
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Yost

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! What can I say, great service! It arrived the day after it shipped in perfect conditions. Definitely loving my bongos. However, they are not tuned, and since I didn't know how to tune them it was kinda frustrating at first, but YOUTUBE TO THE RESCUUEEE! So, no problem tuning it then! The only weakness I notice is that the wood connecting both bongos is a little wobbly, but barely. I still think it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Snowlove

customer_reviews.title: Great set of Bongos
customer_reviews.text: These bongos look beautiful. I ordered them from Amazon and they were shipped and arrived quickly. I was concerned when they arrived as the corner of the box was damaged a little bit. I opened them up and they were fine. I must say that Amazon took care when shipping and packaging them as the bongos were not damaged at all. The bongos sound great and my family is enjoying them. Great value for a good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Chiperman

customer_reviews.title: Just a fabulous value
customer_reviews.text: Despite being priced a little over toy drums sets....you just can't beat the value, sound quality and nice appearance. If put a gun to me, the only minor flaw would be the slight sanding lines left on the wood finish. Purchased for my son for community Drum circle events. I was a little worried they were a little too small, but I am real pleased. They have also proven to be pretty durable. Just an Excellent choice
customer_reviews.author: Judge

customer_reviews.title: They've got a great weight, sound fantastic and look beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my life-long drummer boyfriend. He absolutely LOVES these bongos! They've got a great weight, sound fantastic and look beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my son, very sturdy and the sound is great! The price is great too!
customer_reviews.author: rooj3

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: we got this in time. It was well build. sounds nice. we purchased this for my baby, and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: K Liu

customer_reviews.title: Gift for son.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these bongos for my son who is a musician for Christmas. He really likes the bongos, they sound great, like really good.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are such well made bongos. Granted I am not the best but wanted to use them for church band but everyone was shocked to learn cost! Highly recommended. thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bongos and use them with my Congas
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Barksdale

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and good looking
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound. Enjoying playing them, though I'm just starting out.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ginsburg

customer_reviews.title: He's very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband. He's very happy with them. They are nice looking and sound great.
customer_reviews.author: concerned

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality!
customer_reviews.text: When ordering these bongos I was skeptical that they could be as high quality as described in many of the reviews for this price. When I received them my skepticism was met with the truth that these are not toys but high quality bongos for an incredible price. I have a friend that paid more than $200 for bongos that were not the quality of these that I got for less than $50! Great product, high quality, I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Look like expensive bongos
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for my musical one year, he old loves it. It has good sound and a good price. Nice looking too, we choose dark wood.
customer_reviews.author: My review

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sound and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Shalom Fellowship wanted some bongos for our music ministry, we wanted a real instrument with good sound on a value budget, these bongos fit the bill. The color is beautiful and the quality is great. Thanks for another great deal amazon.
customer_reviews.author: LaelBatYah

customer_reviews.title: Ritmo Bongos Natural Finish
customer_reviews.text: The bongos are nice, I am still trying to tune them so they sound similar to the beginners DVD. Hopefully, if I continue to practice, I will get them tune pefectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my son who was impressed I did my homework, and they sound great! Sturdy and very nice sound.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scott Fagley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a present for my wife and she loved it. I was also happy with the drums.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got my boyfriend these and he absolutely loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value
customer_reviews.text: I write and record surf music, and had a piece that required bongos. I bought the Tycoon based on reviews on this page. I am very pleased with the sound, which is better than bongos I've played costing twice as much. Good quality construction, nice heads, great value. Bill
customer_reviews.author: SurferBill

customer_reviews.title: decent drums
customer_reviews.text: I'm just a drum newbie, but these seem to be decent sounding drums. Note that the nuts connecting the 2 drums together loosened up, and one fell off the first time these were used in a drum-circle. Luckily I found the nut & washer, and when I put them back on I used some lock-tite. (Note that I'm just a drum newbie, not a drum expert!)
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: bingo bango bongo
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our Son-in-law for Christmas, seem a little small, but he enjoys theme! They are a lot of fun
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca West

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who is a drummer. I was surprised how nicely constructed they are. It is obvious that they will last many years. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Competent set of beginner bongos.
customer_reviews.text: the bongos are perfectly heavy in my lap, all the parts are there, and the sound is good. no complaints especially for the sub-$50 price.
customer_reviews.author: BlueSkyRains

customer_reviews.title: Very good Bongos
customer_reviews.text: These things feel like they could handle an atom bomb being dropped on them they are so sturdy, and they also have a good tone to them, very quality bongos.
customer_reviews.author: a customer

product_meta.title: Tycoon Percussion 6 Inch & 7 Inch Ritmo Bongos - Mahogany Finish
product_meta.description: Color:MahoganyTycoon Percussion's Ritmo Series Bongos are ideal for the beginner percussionist. Constructed of aged Siam Oak, with 6” and 7” water buffalo skin heads, they are available in natural or mahogany. Light weight and easy to transport, these are the perfect pair of bongos for students.
feature_bullets: Constructed of hand selected Siam Oak Wood
6" & 7" drums with water buffalo skin heads
Black powder coated traditional hoops, reinforced side plates, 5/16" diameter tuning lugs and backing plates
Ideal for beginners and percussion enthusiasts
6" & 7" drums with water buffalo skin heads
Black powder coated traditional hoops, reinforced side plates, 5/16" diameter tuning lugs and backing plates
Ideal for beginners and percussion enthusiasts
